plot: Kevin P. Coyne, former McKinsey Director & Worldwide Strategy Practice Co-Leader, as he mentors, guides and inspires Alice Qinhua Zhou & Michael E. Klein before their consulting interviews. Real students used have never met Kevin before and have no prior knowledge of the cases used.
